properties.entry: select d.doc_id, a.class, i.train, l.label_id, f.fold, f.run from cv_fold f inner join cv_fold_instance i on f.cv_fold_id = i.cv_fold_id inner join corpus_doc d on d.doc_id = i.instance_id and d.corpus_name = f.corpus_name inner join corpus_doc_anno a on a.label = f.label and a.corpus_doc_id = d.corpus_doc_id inner join corpus_label l on l.corpus_name = d.corpus_name and f.label = a.label where f.corpus_name = 'cmc.2007'
